Name: Marmalade Sour
Ingredients: 15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Tangy sweet and sour marmalade flavours combine with the distinctive grassy notes of cachaça.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2010 by Jamie Boudreau at Vessel, Seattle, USA.
